Introduction
This topic contains guidance on individuals who are authorized to sign claim documents, including
individuals authorized to sign on behalf of a claimant
requirements for an alternate signer
handling
a form or application with an alternate signature
discrepant information on a form with an alternate signature
, and
VA application forms with an alternate signer certification
, and
sample development language for alternate signer
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Recording the Date of Receipt and Handling Signatures and Outdated Forms
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
